error.message: Call to deprecated function module_load_include(). Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. Use Drupal::moduleHandler()->loadInclude($module, $type, $name = NULL). Note that including code from uninstalled extensions is no longer supported.

Using an "if" condition on "for" tag in "modules/contrib/listjs/templates/listjs.html.twig" at line 28 is deprecated since Twig 2.10.0, use a "filter" filter or an "if" condition inside the "for" body instead (if your condition depends on a variable updated inside the loop). See https://drupal.org/node/3071078.

The 'drupal.listjs' library is depending on a deprecated library. The core/jquery.once asset library is deprecated in Drupal 9.3.0 and will be removed in Drupal 10.0.0. Use the core/once library instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3158256
